alias.description: The name of the role alias.

arn.description: The ARN assigned by AWS to this role alias.

credentialDuration.description: The duration of the credential, in seconds. If you do not specify a value for this setting, the default maximum of one hour is applied. This setting can have a value from 900 seconds (15 minutes) to 43200 seconds (12 hours).

roleArn.description: The identity of the role to which the alias refers.
